basics.description: **Important:** _This Microsoft Sentinel Solution is currently in public preview. This feature is provided without a service level agreement, and it's not recommended for production workloads. Certain features might not be supported or might have constrained capabilities. For more information, see [Supplemental Terms of Use for Microsoft Azure Previews](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/)._ **Note:** _There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing._ The [Corelight](https://corelight.com/) solution provides the capability to ingest events from [Zeek](https://zeek.org/) and [Suricata](https://suricata.io/) via Corelight Sensors into Microsoft Sentinel. **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:** This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs: a. [Agent based logs collection from Windows and Linux machines](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/agents/data-sources-custom-logs) Microsoft Sentinel Solutions provide a consolidated way to acquire Microsoft Sentinel content like data connectors, workbooks, analytics, and automations in your workspace with a single deployment step. **Data Connectors:** 1, **Parsers:** 108, **Workbooks:** 1, **Analytic Rules:** 10, **Hunting Queries:** 10 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

The Solution installs a parser that transforms the ingested data into Microsoft Sentinel normalized format. The normalized format enables better correlation of different types of data from different data sources to drive end-to-end outcomes seamlessly in security monitoring, hunting, incident investigation and response scenarios in Microsoft Sentinel.

options.text: This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs workbooks. Workbooks provide a flexible canvas for data monitoring, analysis, and the creation of rich visual reports within the Azure portal. They allow you to tap into one or many data sources from Microsoft Sentinel and combine them into unified interactive experiences.
Sample Corelight workbook

This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs analytic rules for Corelight that you can enable for custom alert generation in Microsoft Sentinel. These analytic rules will be deployed in disabled mode in the analytics rules gallery of your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. Configure and enable these rules in the analytic rules gallery after this Solution deploys.

elements.name: analytic1
elements.label: Corelight - C2 DGA Detected Via Repetitive Failures

options.text: Detects large amounts of DNS resolution failures.
Detects external proxy usage.
Detects SMB requests that originate internally and communicate with an external IP address.

elements.name: analytic4
elements.label: Corelight - Multiple Compressed Files Transferred over HTTP

options.text: Detects compressed archives transferre over HTTP.

elements.name: analytic5
elements.label: Corelight - Multiple files sent over HTTP with abnormal requests

options.text: Detects sources sending multiple compressed files greater than 10MBs sent over HTTP in a short amount of time.

elements.name: analytic6
elements.label: Corelight - Network Service Scanning Multiple IP Addresses

options.text: Identify scanning of services that may be available on the internal network.
Detects post requests to unusual extensions.

elements.name: analytic8
elements.label: Corelight - Possible Webshell (Rare PUT or POST)

options.text: Detects rare post requests to a single webserver location.

elements.name: analytic9
elements.label: Corelight - SMTP Email containing NON Ascii Characters within the Subject

options.text: Detects where an emails contain non ascii characters within the Subject.

elements.name: analytic10
elements.label: Corelight - Possible Typo Squatting or Punycode Phishing HTTP Request

options.text: Detects when an HTTP request was made to a domain that was using unicode/punycode.

This Microsoft Sentinel Solution installs hunting queries for Corelight that you can run in Microsoft Sentinel. These hunting queries will be deployed in the Hunting gallery of your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. Run these hunting queries to hunt for threats in the Hunting gallery after this Solution deploys.
Query searches for emails with NON-Ascii characters within the Subject . It depends on the Corelight data connector and corelight_smtp data type and Corelight parser.

elements.name: huntingquery2
elements.label: Corelight - Compressed Files Transferred over HTTP

options.text: Query searches for top sources which transferred compressed archives over HTTP. It depends on the Corelight data connector and corelight_http data type and Corelight parser.

elements.name: huntingquery3
elements.label: Corelight - Top sources of data transferred

options.text: Query searches for top sources by transferred data over period of time. It depends on the Corelight data connector and corelight_http data type and Corelight parser.
Query searches for external facing services. It depends on the Corelight data connector and corelight_conn data type and Corelight parser.
Query searches for files which where seen in logs over period of time. It depends on the Corelight data connector and corelight_files data type and Corelight parser.
Query searches for files transferred over period of time by each source. It depends on the Corelight data connector and corelight_http data type and Corelight parser.

elements.name: huntingquery7
elements.label: Corelight - Multiple Remote SMB Connections from single client

options.text: Detects when a single source is connecting to many different SMB or file shares. It depends on the Corelight data connector and corelight_smb_mapping data type and Corelight parser.
Query searches for downloaded obfuscated binary file names. It depends on the Corelight data connector and corelight_http data type and Corelight parser.
Query searches for rare post requests to a single location. It depends on the Corelight data connector and corelight_http data type and Corelight parser.
Query searches for repetitive DNS resolution failures from single host. It depends on the Corelight data connector and corelight_dns data type and Corelight parser.
